items.sentence: Tom says Mary is his soul mate and that they were made for each other.
How much does it usually cost to go to a professional basketball game?
I have no reason to believe that Tom won\'t do what I asked him to do.
Tom has way too much common sense to do what Mary\'s asking him to do.
Tom is a young teacher and doesn\'t have much teaching experience yet.
You know you\'re getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
Someone should\'ve been able to come up with a better title than that.
I wonder whether or not Tom has ever considered going to a specialist.
You don\'t really plan to go outside on a cold day like today, do you?
Starting today, I\'m going to try to read at least three books a week.
You\'re more talkative than most of Tom\'s other friends, aren\'t you?
Tom took the box to the basement and put it on top of the other boxes.
Tom was completely devastated when he heard that Mary had been killed.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t want to hear any more talk about aliens.
Australia is one of the most interesting countries I\'ve ever visited.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to be able to convince Mary to do that.
I never heard back from you, so I thought you wouldn\'t be here today.
Nothing remained in the room other than an old table and an old chair.
I think that it\'s unlikely that Tom will get back in time for supper.
How different do you think the world will be a hundred years from now?
